title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Maximizing AI Governance and Speed—Only with ServiceNow + AWS (ARC337)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 最大化AI治理和速度——仅通过ServiceNow + AWS (ARC337)
abstract: Enterprises can’t scale AI responsibly without uniting workflow governance and cloud control—and only ServiceNow and AWS make that possible. Together, they bring the best of both worlds: ServiceNow’s AI Control Tower and ServiceNow Vault for trusted model, agent, and data protection, combined with Amazon’s Bedrock and Audit Manager for cloud-scale visibility and compliance. With Responsible AI built into every layer—from workflow to infrastructure—organizations can innovate faster, stay compliant, and maintain complete control with confidence. This presentation is brought to you by ServiceNow, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 企业如果没有统一的工作流治理和云控制，就无法负责任地扩展AI——只有ServiceNow和AWS能够实现这一点。它们结合了两个世界的精华：ServiceNow的AI控制塔和ServiceNow Vault提供可信的模型、代理和数据保护，结合Amazon的Bedrock和Audit Manager提供云规模的可见性和合规性。通过将负责任的AI内置到每一层——从工作流到基础设施——组织可以更快地创新、保持合规，并充满信心地维持完全控制。本演示由AWS合作伙伴ServiceNow为您呈现。
